fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: -Attack a player who mentions the number 2678, or any combination of 2 of those numbers, including the same number twice

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-This role exists solely to take up this number
-You die immediately if a survivor is redirected into you. This cannot be stopped
-A survivor and at least one controlling role must spawn for this role to spawn
-A mayor must also spawn
